sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react' import './App.css'; import data from './data' class MainContent extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { i: 8 } } render() { return(
{`${data[this.state.i].name.first} ${data[this.state.i].name.last}`}

From:

{`${data[this.state.i].city}, ${data[this.state.i].country}`}

Job Title:

{data[this.state.i].title}

Employer:

{data[this.state.i].employer}

) } } export default MainContent
